FuncDef: The dldp reset command resets the DLDP Disable status on a port to restore DLDP detection. The dldp reset command resets the DLDP Disable status on a port to restore DLDP detection.
ExtraInfo: After DLDP detects the existence of a unidirectional link, the port enters the Disable state. In this case, DLDP prompts users to close the port or closes the port automatically. To restore DLDP detection on a port, use one of these methods to reset DLDP:
